author: @mcarvalho
title: Ausência de Messi nas Olimpíadas de Paris pela Argentina
text:
Argentina
Jogos Olímpicos Messi fora das Olimpíadas de Paris; veja por que o astro argentino não estará com a seleção Lionel Messi, da Argentina, finalmente conquistou a Copa do Mundo no Catar em 2022, completando uma coleção de medalhas.
Por Matheus Carvalho
25/07/2024 - 21:11hs BRT
Por Matheus Carvalho
25/07/2024 - 21:11hs BRT
Messi não vai para Paris O técnico da seleção olímpica da Argentina, Javier Mascherano, expressou o desejo de contar com Lionel Messi na equipe para os Jogos Olímpicos de Paris, como um dos três jogadores acima dos 23 anos. No entanto, essa possibilidade foi descartada.
© Getty Images Lionel Messi da Argentina. (Foto de Buda Mendes/Getty Images) Brasil nas Olimpíadas 2024: Veja resultados do dia 25/07 Martha pode conquistar finalmente o ouro olímpico na despedida da seleção Durante a Data Fifa, antes da Copa América, em que Messi se sagraria campeão, o camisa 10 revelou à ESPN da Argentina seus planos de voltar à MLS após o torneio pela Albiceleste:
“Conversei com Mascherano e entendemos a situação. É difícil pensar nas Olimpíadas agora porque estamos na Copa América. Seriam dois, três meses seguidos sem estar com o clube, e mais do que tudo, não estou em uma idade para estar em tudo.”
Já foi campeão olímpico O jogador ainda completou: “Tenho que escolher com cuidado, e seria demais jogar dois torneios seguidos. Tive a sorte de jogar nas Olimpíadas e vencê-las com ‘Masche’. Foi uma experiência maravilhosa. Olimpíadas, Sub-20, são memórias que nunca vou esquecer. Espero que os jogadores que forem possam aproveitar da mesma forma que eu, porque é especial. As Olimpíadas são especiais, diferentes de qualquer outra competição.”
Messi conquistou a medalha de ouro olímpica em 2008, em Pequim. Embora ele não participe desse torneio novamente, o craque mencionou a possibilidade de estender sua carreira na seleção até a Copa do Mundo de 2026:
Argentina ganhará o Jogos de Paris? Argentina ganhará o Jogos de Paris?
0 PESSOAS JÁ VOTARAM
“Eu disse, enquanto me sentir bem, estiver fisicamente bem e puder continuar atuando no mais alto nível e ajudando meus companheiros, gostaria de continuar estando lá.”
Messi conquistou Copa do Mundo Messi finalmente conquistou a Copa do Mundo no Catar em 2022, completando uma coleção de medalhas de forma dramática, e continuará a reescrever os livros de história com seus feitos nas 181 partidas e 106 gols pela Argentina.
Veja também
Reações da Web: Torcedores criticam desdobramentos de Argentina x Marrocos nas Olimpíadas 2024
Agora, com o bicampeonato da Copa América, o “ET” retornará ao Inter Miami para buscar o título da MLS.
Matheus Carvalho
Matheus Carvalho é um jornalista que há cerca de cinco anos atua cobrindo esportes como futebol, com ênfase em futebol brasileiro, sul-americano e europeu. Graduado em Jornalismo pela Universidade Veiga de Almeida em 2019. Atualmente no Bolavip Brasil, passou por veículos de comunicação como Futebol na Veia, Quinto Quarto BR e Esportelândia.

author: Adélie Reginster
title: Des aurores boréales ont illuminé le ciel belge la nuit dernière (PHOTOS)
text: Des aurores boréales ont illuminé le ciel belge la nuit dernière (PHOTOS) Des aurores boréales ont illuminé le ciel cette nuit à plusieurs endroits de Belgique, mais également en France et au Canada notamment. [Ad.R.](/journaliste/adelie-reginster-5def50a3f20d5a0c46f35602/)Journaliste web pour La DH, La Libre et Paris Match Belgique - Publié le 11-10-2024 à 15h26 Des aurores boréales étaient attendues dans le ciel dans la nuit de samedi à dimanche, mais elles ont déjà eu lieu la nuit passée. En effet, de nombreux observateurs ont publié sur les réseaux sociaux des clichés de ces magnifiques lumières roses, bleues et vertes qui ont illuminé le ciel entre jeudi et vendredi. Les aurores boréales étaient visibles depuis plusieurs endroits de la France, aux Pays-Bas, aux États-Unis et au Canada, ainsi qu'en Belgique. Chez nous, ce sont surtout les habitants de deux Flandres et d'Anvers qui ont pu observer ces phénomènes lumineux exceptionnels, comme en témoignent de nombreuses photos diffusées sur X.

author: JACKSON WALKER | The National News Desk
title: House Judiciary GOP says Biden-Harris admin used courts to fuel illegal immigration
text:
by JACKSON WALKER | The National News Desk
Thu, October 24th 2024 at 5:20 PM Updated Thu, October 24th 2024 at 5:34 PM PHILADELPHIA, PENNSYLVANIA - FEBRUARY 03: U.S. President Joe Biden and U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris hold hands onstage after speaking at the Democratic National Committee winter meeting on February 03, 2023 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. (Photo by Anna Moneymaker/Getty Images) TOPICS:
Biden-Harris administration Immigration courts Illegal immigration Secure the Border Act Border crisis Immigration policies Quiet amnesty Vice President Harris WASHINGTON (TNND) — A new report by the House Judiciary Committee GOP released Thursday accused the Biden-Harris administration of using U.S. immigration courts to sidestep legal proceedings which would weed out illegal migrants.
The Biden-Harris administration has overseen over 700,000 immigration court cases involving illegal immigrants which have been dismissed, terminated or closed, the report says. This has allowed the migrants to remain in the country without consequences for violating federal immigration laws.
The administration allegedly also took advantage of a swelling backlog of immigration court cases to allow these individuals to continue to go free. Such “quiet amnesty,” according to the report, could prove detrimental to the country.
“In the face of an unprecedented border crisis, the Biden-Harris Administration and Senate Democrats have chosen to ignore H.R. 2, the House-passed Secure the Border Act of 2023,” the document reads. “It is beyond time for President Biden and Vice President Harris to end the border crisis and stop their backdoor amnesty.”
Report authors continued, calling on the Senate to pass the Secure the Border Act as the committee continues its “aggressive oversight” into the Biden-Harris administration’s immigration policies.
“For nearly four years, the Biden-Harris Administration has systematically remade America’s immigration courts in the image of open-borders extremism,” the report reads. “Instead of encouraging immigration judges to adjudicate cases and order aliens removed from the United States, the Biden-Harris Administration has used the border crisis as a pretext to remove myriad cases from immigration judges’ dockets.”
Immigration continues to be a thorn in Vice President Harris’s side as she campaigns for control of the Oval Office. In an interview with “60 Minutes” this month, Harris vowed to fix the "longstanding" problem with solutions "at hand."
“It's a longstanding problem,” she said of immigration. “And solutions are at hand. And from day one, literally, we have been offering solutions.”
"But the numbers did quadruple under your, under your watch?" interviewer Bill Whitaker asked.
“And the numbers today, because of what we have done, we have cut the flow of illegal immigration by half," Harris responded.
The vice president this month, however, also said during an appearance on “The View” there is “not a thing” she would have done differently than Biden, a remark that drew the ire of some Republicans on social media.
The White House did not respond to a request for comment from The National News Desk on Thursday.
Follow Jackson Walker on X at @_jlwalker_ for the latest trending national news. Have a news tip? Send it to jacwalker@sbgtv.com.

author: Abhinandan Pandey
title: Bihar Rain Alert: बिहार के इन 6 जिलों में अगले 3 घंटे होगी भयंकर बारिश! पटना में भी मेघगर्जन और ठनका का अलर्ट
text:
Bihar Rain Alert: बिहार में एक बार फिर मौसम ने रुख बदल लिया है. बुधवार की सुबह जहां कई जिलों में तेज आंधी, वज्रपात और बारिश दर्ज की गई, वहीं अब राज्य भीषण गर्मी और हीट वेव के दौर में प्रवेश कर रहा है. हालांकि, मौसम विभाग ने आज गुरुवार की सुबह राज्य के कुछ जिलों में मेघगर्जन, वज्रपात के साथ बारिश का अलर्ट जारी किया है. यह चेतावनी पटना, समस्तीपुर, दरभंगा, मुजफ्फरपुर, वैशाली, अरवल सहित कुछ अन्य जिलों के लिए जारी की गई है.
वहीं मौसम विभाग ने 10 से 16 मई तक हीट वेव के लिए येलो अलर्ट जारी किया है. इस दौरान तापमान 40 डिग्री सेल्सियस या उससे अधिक रहने की संभावना है, वहीं पछुआ हवाओं के प्रभाव के चलते प्रदेश के कई जिलों में लू चलने की चेतावनी दी गई है.
राज्य के अधिकांश हिस्सों में बहेगी गर्म एवं शुष्क हवा पटना स्थित मौसम विज्ञान केंद्र के निदेशक आशीष कुमार ने बताया कि मध्य भारत और ओडिशा के पास एक प्रति चक्रवातीय परिसंचरण सक्रिय है. इसके प्रभाव से बिहार के अधिकांश हिस्सों में गर्म एवं शुष्क पछुआ हवाएं बहेंगी. इसका सीधा असर तापमान पर पड़ेगा, जिससे दिन और रात दोनों में गर्मी अधिक महसूस की जाएगी. 16 मई तक प्रदेश में हॉट डे और हीट वेव की स्थिति बनी रह सकती है.
लू और भीषण गर्मी की चपेट में रहेंगे राज्य के ये जिले सबसे अधिक प्रभावित जिले उत्तर-पश्चिमी और दक्षिण-पश्चिम बिहार के बताए जा रहे हैं. पश्चिम चंपारण, पूर्वी चंपारण, गोपालगंज, सीवान, सारण, बक्सर, भोजपुर, रोहतास, कैमूर, औरंगाबाद और अरवल के नगर निकाय क्षेत्र लू और भीषण गर्मी की चपेट में रहेंगे. इन इलाकों में अधिकतम तापमान 40 डिग्री सेल्सियस के पार जा सकता है.
लोगों से मौसम विभाग की खास अपील हालांकि, उत्तर-पूर्वी बिहार के जिलों सुपौल, अररिया, किशनगंज, सहरसा, मधेपुरा, पूर्णिया और कटिहार में गर्मी का प्रभाव अपेक्षाकृत कम रहेगा. यहां हॉट डे या हीट वेव की संभावना नगण्य है. मौसम विभाग ने नागरिकों को चेताया है कि वे जरूरी न हो तो दोपहर 12 से 4 बजे के बीच बाहर निकलने से बचें. धूप में निकलते समय सिर ढकें, पानी अधिक पिएं और बच्चों व बुजुर्गों का खास ध्यान रखें.
Also Read: आज सब आए हैं, कल कितने लोग याद रखेंगे?… जम्मू-कश्मीर में शहीद हुए JCO सुजीत की पत्नी ने क्या कहा…

author: David Tooley
title: Shropshire education supremo honoured with MBE wants 'fantastic' colleagues recognised
text: Shropshire education supremo honoured with MBE wants 'fantastic' colleagues recognised A man who has dedicated his life to teaching says his New Year Honours award for services to education recognises the dedication of the profession. [David Tooley](https://www.shropshirestar.com/news/authors/david-tooley/) Married father-of-two Mike Cladingbowl, who lives in Wem, received the MBE in the New Year Honours after a career that took him from teacher to Ofsted chief to academy trustee. Mr Cladingbowl, 65, said: "I am thrilled and really excited that my work has been recognised in this way. "But the real reason I am pleased is that it is recognition of the fantastic people I have worked with over the years. "I would like to give a big shout-out to colleagues past and present at the Fields and Empower multi-academy trusts, plus all the teachers, support staff and all the fantastic staff who support schools." Mike said he received a letter a few weeks ago recommending him for an award. "It just landed on the mat like all the other post, and probably bills," he said. "It was a surprise to receive it and it was not expected." After working as a teacher and headteacher at a school in Cheshire, he moved to schools inspector Ofsted where he worked for 13 years. He left the organisation as national director of inspection reform in 2015 to take up the post of executive principal at Knutsford Multi-Academy Trust. After working as the chief executive of The Learning Alliance in Cheshire, he set up his own bespoke educational consultancy company, Education Associates Limited. He has lived in north Shropshire for 20 years, is married to Valerie Bernard with whom he had two children, a son who attends Thomas Adams School, and a daughter who is in her third year studying classics at Oxford University. He says his own children's academic success is all about the excellence of the teachers at their schools. Mike is also well known at two multi-academy trusts in Shropshire. He retired from Fields last Spring but had been chair of the board of trustees from from when it was first set up. The trust runs Clive CE School & Nursery, Prees CE School & Nursery and Whixall CE School & Nursery in north Shropshire. He remains a trustee at Empower Multi-Academy Trust which has schools including in Market Drayton and Shrewsbury. Mike added that he would like to give a "shout-out" to all the people who work in education and wished them a Happy New Year.
